sentences.en: It offered twenty - five miles per gallon in city driving and forty - one on the highway.
sentences.cn: 它在市区内的路上,每加仑汽油可以跑25英里,在公路上则可跑41英里.

sentences.en: Just two months earlier, gas had been sold for sixty - five cents a gallon.
sentences.cn: 两个月之前, 汽油还是六十五美分一加仑.

sentences.en: One gallon is eight pints, or 4.5 litres.
sentences.cn: 一加仑等于八品脱或四升半.

sentences.en: One gallon of water weighs 4 pounds.
The car does about 50 miles per gallon.
sentences.cn: 这辆车每加仑油能开50英里左右。

sentences.en: The car used a gallon of petrol for the journey.
sentences.cn: 汽车在路上消耗了一加仑汽油.

sentences.en: The government has put ten pence on the price of a gallon of petrol.
sentences.cn: 当局已将每加仑汽油涨价十便士.

sentences.en: The imperial gallon is not the same size as the US one.
sentences.cn: 英制的加仑与美制的容量不同.

sentences.en: The price of petrol is coming down by four pence a gallon.
sentences.cn: 汽油的价格每加仑降了4便士。

sentences.en: There are eight pints in a gallon.
This car runs 5 miles on a gallon of gasoline.
sentences.cn: 这部汽车一加仑汽油可以行驶五英里.

sentences.en: Trees can be trucked to the field in 50 - gallon drums one - third full of water.
sentences.cn: 栽植果树时要把果苗泡在50加仑的大桶中加水满 1/3,用卡车运到田里.

sentences.en: Unleaded gasoline rose more than a penny a gallon.
sentences.cn: 无铅汽油每加仑涨了1分多。

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring liquids, equal to eight pints. In Britain this is 4.55 litres, and in the US it is 3.79 litres.
